Back to Johann Sebastian Bach

Johann Sebastian Bach

Toccata in D minor, BWV 913

no later than 1708–1709

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

The toccata exists in two versions, denoted in BWV3 as 913.1 and 913.2 respectively.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Bach-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · V, 9/1 · BA 5091-01 · Toccaten · ed. Peter Woolny [both versions]
  • Bärenreiter · BA 5235 · Toccaten · ed. Peter Woolny [both versions]
  • Henle · HN 126 · Toccaten · ed. Rudolf Steglich [second version]
  • Henle · HN 127 · Toccaten · ed. Rudolf Steglich [second version]
  • Henle · HN 1126 · Toccaten · ed. Rudolf Steglich [second version]
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50081 · Toccaten · ed. Christian Eisert [both versions]

First version

Duration: 11' 30"

Difficulty: 3

Second version

Duration: 11' 30"

Difficulty: 3
